With this feature, you can find articles, blog posts, and pages published on a particular site \u2014 especially when it doesn\u2019t have a built-in search feature available."),mdx("img",{src:"/images/20220212095550-search-website.png",alt:"Searching within a site"}),mdx("h1",null,"7","."," Gradually Increase the Words in Your Search Term"),mdx("p",null,"Google recommends that you start a search with only the basic search terms. For example, if you are trying to find courses for learning Javascript, start with the most basic phrase and gradually increase the number of words in your search term until you find what you are looking for:"),mdx("ul",null,mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},"JavaScript courses"),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},"JavaScript courses for beginners"),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},"JavaScript courses for beginners Youtube")),mdx("p",null,"Following this searching strategy has a few benefits. Using a broader search term first gives you the chance to see the big picture of the topic and the different avenues available to take. It also ensures that you don\u2019t miss any important information by going straight to a refined, focused search term. As you add more words to the search term, you get to see results that are more targeted to your specific needs."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;
